div.div: AWS with server with a particular IP address

div.div: The backend can access only the server with that IP address and this server is fully configured and controlled by the developer

switch.text: The backend can access only the server with...

div.div: The serverless with issue an URL not an IP address and the aws will have a internal load balance and it knows which function to call from the lambda

switch.text: The serverless with issue an URL not an IP...

div.div: Serverless lambda services which runs only the requested lambda service when needed and not 24/7
